name: Watermelon Cucumber
desc1: 21 count bag of “Watermelon Cucumber” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: A sweet, cool and refreshing smell for brightening up your day. Great for picnic blankets, overalls, and being in a generally good mood.

name: White Gardenia
desc1: 21 count bag of “White Gardenia” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: A sweet and floral perfume with relaxing notes, best used after a carefree frolic through a field of wildflowers.

name: Mahogany Teakwood
desc1: 21 count bag of “Mahogany Teakwood” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: A great everyday alternative to cologne, or for a getaway to a log cabin hidden deep in a snowy forest.

name: Fresh Air
desc1: 21 count bag of “Fresh Air” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: A soft, cottony fragrance that smells even cleaner than clean. Great for leaping face-first into a gigantic, fluffy comforter.

name: Coffee Vanilla
desc1: 21 count bag of “Coffee Vanilla” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: Smells like the steam rising off of a hot vanilla latte. Great for sitting in an armchair in a quaint neighborhood cafe.

name: Eucalyptus Tea Tree
desc1: 21 count bag of “Eucalyptus Tea Tree” scented Laundr Bombs
desc2: A natural scent inspired by popular aromatherapy oil mixtures. Great for towels, bath robes, and having a "me day."
